extension.name: Ramblers Calendar
extension.author: Keith Grimes
extension.description:
Ramblers Calendar Package successfully installed!

This package contains all extensions constituting the Ramblers Calendar Download functionality. It provides means to download Ramblers walks to your local calendar.

If you have any questions or problems, please visit the project site.
In case you want to uninstall Ramblers Calendar download, please use the Package to uninstall all extensions at once!
Ramblers Calendar Download is published under the GNU General Public License.
